name: Ricochet: 'Round the Corner
description:
In Ricochet, you play as Ellie and using her laser rifle, you help her solve puzzles involving shooting lasers into ancient capacitors (or "goals", as she calls them) found in her forest.  Use your wits to bounce lasers into all the goals while navigating obstacles within the level.

Features
  • 3 chapters consisting of 15 puzzles that range from simple to more complex
  • Fire lasers that realistically bounce off surfaces
  • Interactable level elements to aid progression
  • A double jumping and climbing mechanic allowing for skillful traversal around levels
